proposal: Diving into the world of football with NFTs? 🏈 ELVN's got the game on lock with their officially licensed K League collection. With 104 holders on the ETH network, it's clear you're onto something special. Imagine integrating a DEX or a community-driven lottery to kick things up a notch. Your fans could trade, stake, or even govern with ELVN at the heart of it all. Let's bring the spirit of the game into the crypto space, one goal at a time.
